meanings.definition: A man who is a member of a committee.
meanings.sent1: The committeeman attended the meeting to discuss the budget.
meanings.sent2: The committeeman was chosen to represent the employees on the committee.
meanings.sent3: The committeeman brought donuts to the meeting to sweeten the discussions.
meanings.sent4: As a committeeman, he was the bridge between the staff and the management.
meanings.sent5: The committeeman's dedication to his role was evident in every meeting he attended.

meanings.definition: A man who serves on a committee.
meanings.sent1: The committeeman worked hard to address the issues raised by the committee.
meanings.sent2: Being a committeeman requires a lot of time and effort.
meanings.sent3: The committeeman joked that he needed a cape for all the committee meetings he attended.
meanings.sent4: In the world of committees, the committeeman was a shining star.
meanings.sent5: The committeeman's passion for serving on committees was unmatched.
